scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm start
scripts.backend: cd backend && npm i && mkdir -p data && curl --output data/test_db.sqlite https://kq-storage.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/Simulated_work_backend/milestone25.sqlite && node app.js
scripts.test:serve: cd backend && npm i && mkdir -p data && curl --output data/test_db.sqlite https://kq-storage.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/Simulated_work_backend/milestone25.sqlite && node ./spec/runTests.js
scripts.testing: cd backend && npm i && mkdir -p data && curl --output data/test_db.sqlite https://kq-storage.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/Simulated_work_backend/milestone25.sqlite && node spec/run-jasmine.js
